resources.string: Welcome to Quiet Hours! You will only see this screen once. The background service has been started.

Simply add "_silent" or "_vibrate" anywhere in the description field of a calendar event (one that is synced to your phone, of course!) and all phone calls will be either silent or vibrating duration of the calendar event.
Please contact me if you have feedback: sturmen@outlook.com (or catch me on twitter: @sturmen)
This application is open source. You can find the source code for Quiet Hours here: https://github.com/sturmen/Quiet-Hours
